channel.title: Help with noclip command

item.title: Help with noclip command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:4, topic:271521”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod zakary”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“r a n g e r”)

Change to

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && !(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod zakary”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“r a n g e r”))) {

EDIT: Guess I was a little late.[/quote]
<3

Read full topic

item.title: Help with noclip command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Instead of disconnecting, then banning, just make the command log the user out.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod zakary") || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("r a n g e r")) { outStream.createFrame(109); }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with noclip command

item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod zakary") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("r a n g e r") PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Has tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName);

&& !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod zakary”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“r a n g e r”)
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Has tried to noclip and has been autobanned!");
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);

is that command ok?
